description: Describe traffic mirror filters that determine the traffic that is mirrored.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Traffic mirror filters. traffic-mirror-filter-rule-id: The ID of the Traffic Mirror rule. traffic-mirror-filter-id: The ID of the filter that this rule is associated with. rule-number: The number of the Traffic Mirror rule. rule-action: The action taken on the filtered traffic. Possible actions are accept and reject. traffic-direction: The traffic direction. Possible directions are ingress and egress. protocol: The protocol, for example UDP, assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule. source-cidr-block: The source CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule. destination-cidr-block: The destination CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule. description: The description of the Traffic Mirror rule. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterRules
nested_items.description: Traffic mirror rules.

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterRuleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror filter that the rule is associated with.

nested_items.name: TrafficDirection
nested_items.description: The traffic direction assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: RuleNumber
nested_items.description: The rule number of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: RuleAction
nested_items.description: The action assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: DestinationPortRange
nested_items.description: The destination port range assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The start of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The end of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: SourcePortRange
nested_items.description: The source port range assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The start of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The end of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: DestinationCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The destination CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: SourceCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The source CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Tags on Traffic Mirroring filter rules.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value is null when there are no more results to return.
